entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Periods of light snow beginning early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 16. POP 40%
